settings.block_desc: Every scoop of Living Cleansing Balm is a sensorial experience — gliding onto skin to gently melt away makeup, sunscreen and oil-based impurities while restoring vital moisture.

settings.title: THE JET SET TRIO
settings.description: Our TSA-approved trio is ready for takeoff. We’ve curated a must-have set featuring three of our award-winning essentials in travel sizes to help you maintain your radiant glow on-the-go.

settings.block_title: "I actually look forward to the time that I spend taking off my makeup and city grime every evening."
settings.block_description: ——Charlotte Cho, Founder of Then I Met You

settings.block_rev: Then I Met You Living Cleansing Balm is widely worshipped for a reason. The velvety formula melts away makeup, promotes calm, and practically turns washing your face into a purification ritual.
Periwinkle blue and sunshine yellow is a color combo now synonymous with Then I Met You.
My favorite part about this moisturizer definitely has to be its gel texture — it's super cooling and lightweight, and it transforms into cloud-like water as it absorbs into the skin.
Charlotte Cho's new double cleanser is a cult product in the making.

settings.title: OUR STORY
settings.description:
"Because of the deep connection I have with Korea, I find it important for Then I Met You to honor Korea’s rich beauty culture while highlighting the country’s incredible innovations in research and development at the same time—a perfect fusion of our past and present.”

– Charlotte Cho,Founder of Then I Met You
